revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Sunburst Island |image = [[File:Sunburst Island.png|thumb]] |caption = An outside view of Sunburst Island. |tokens = 43,000 |location = Sevii Island 5, south of Memorial Pillar route. }} '''Sunburst Island''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 720,600 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Hoppip.png|40px]] Hoppip|| colspan=2 rowspan=12| <center> N/A |- | [[File:Tentacool.png|40px]] Tentacool |- | [[File:Tentacruel.png|40px]] Tentacruel |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Horsea.png|40px]] Horsea |- | [[File:Krabby.png|40px]] Krabby |- | [[File:Qwilfish.png|40px]] Qwilfish |- | [[File:Remoraid.png|40px]] Remoraid |- | [[File:Gyarados.png|40px]] Gyarados |- | [[File:Seadra.png|40px]] Seadra |- | [[File:Kingler.png|40px]] Kingler |- | [[File:Slowpoke.png|40px]] Slowpoke |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Crystal Onix.png|40px]] Crystal Onix|| <center> 4,500,000 || colspan=3|<center>N/A |}

<tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
